Key Match Events: South Africa won by 1 wicket (with 16 balls remaining)
Aiden Markram scored 91 runs for South Africa
Post-Match Reflections: Tabraiz Shamsi was awarded Player of the Match for his 4/60
Miscellaneous Highlights: Usama Mir replaced Shadab Khan as a concussion substitute during 15th over of South Africa innings
South Africa maintained their unbeaten record in this ICC Cricket World Cup
Others: The match was played at MA Chidambaram Stadium, Chepauk, Chennai
The match was a 50-over match played under day-night conditions
